item.title: TRVL: Japan. Skiing, Tokyo and Kyoto
item.description: It started as an innocent idea concluding my 2022 Canada ski trip: what if we went to Japan for ski trip, instead of Canada? Indeed, sometimes the border crossing and car travel time would amount to a length of a direct SEA->HND. Japan was locked for travel at the time and we decided to commit to it softly, putting little hope on this actually coming to fruition. jumping ahead, a piece of contemporary japanese art Lo and behold: mid 2022 fall Japan has re-opened for tourism and the place we booked for stay did not go out of business because of Covid.
